title: Authority for expedited conversion, merger,
context: ยง412:3-616 Authority for expedited conversion, merger, consolidation, acquisition, or assumption. Upon application of all participating financial institutions in a conversion, merger, consolidation, acquisition or assumption, the commissioner may expedite any application for conversion, merger, consolidation, acquisition, or assumption pursuant to this part and order the transaction to take effect immediately; provided that the financial institutions shall have complied with any applicable federal law and provided that the commissioner finds that such expedited action is necessary to protect the financial institutions&rsquo; depositors, beneficiaries, creditors, or shareholders, or the public. The commissioner&rsquo;s findings shall be expressed in writing as part of the decision and order approving the conversion, merger, consolidation, acquisition, or assumption.
